name: Stanley Vonbraun
description: As shown and like many Neo Britannian’s, Stanley exhibited monstrous brutality and little care for the lives of non-Britannians. Having personally designed theLokiKnightmare Frames for the sake of killing the enemies of theNeo Britannian Empire’s in a extremmely horrific manner. UnlikeChristoph Scissorman, he did not believe into the occult like power ofGeassand much preferred focusing his research on technology and Knightmare Frame development.
